section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Strong Slovak group of companies, with core business in the production of biofuels, ethanol, spirits, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, agricultural and food products. The group is also expanding into transportation (trains and trucks), logistic, billing and IT.
industry_forums: We are watching the relevant Industry forums in the areas of our interests.
